from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql import Row
import datetime
import ast
import re
import calendar
import pandas

account_name = "chiransubdl"
container_name = "chiransubfs"

customer_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/customers.csv")
geolocation_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/geolocation.csv")
delivery_services_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/delivery_services.csv")
order_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/orders.csv")
order_items_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_items.csv")
order_reviews_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_reviews.csv")
order_payments_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_payments.csv")
products_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/products.csv")
product_categories_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/product_categories.csv")
sellers_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/sellers.csv")
suppliers_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/suppliers.csv")

customer_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(customer_raw_path)
customer_df.createOrReplaceTempView("customer")

order_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_raw_path)
order_df.createOrReplaceTempView("order")

order_items_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_items_raw_path)
order_items_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderitems")

order_payments_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_payments_raw_path)
order_payments_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderpayments")

order_reviews_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_reviews_raw_path)
order_reviews_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderreviews")

products_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(products_raw_path)
products_df.createOrReplaceTempView("product")

product_categorie_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(product_categories_raw_path)
product_categorie_df.createOrReplaceTempView("productcategories")

geolocation_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(geolocation_raw_path)
geolocation_df.createOrReplaceTempView("geolocation")

delivery_services_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(delivery_services_raw_path)
delivery_services_df.createOrReplaceTempView("deliveryservices")

seller_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(sellers_raw_path)
seller_df.createOrReplaceTempView("seller")

supplier_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(suppliers_raw_path)
supplier_df.createOrReplaceTempView("supplier")

getBirthYear = udf(lambda z: getsubstring(z,0,4))
getBirthMonth = udf(lambda z: getsubstring(z,5,7))
getAge = udf(lambda z: calc_age(z))
generationBucketizer = udf(lambda z: bucketize(z,[18,23,39,55,64,199],["Children","GenerationZ","Millenials","GenX","BabyBoomer","Silent"]),StringType())
ageCategoryBucketizer = udf(lambda z: bucketize(z,[18,25,35,45,55,65,199],["0-18","19-25","26-35","36-45","46-55","56-65","66+"]),StringType())
socialStateBucketizer = udf(lambda z: social_state(z,["0-19999","100000-199999"],["Poor","Wealthy","Mid Level Income"]),StringType())
getPhoneOperator = udf(lambda z: getsubstring(z,0,3))

customer_df = sk_generator('customer_id','sk_customer','customer')\
.withColumn( 'birth_year', getBirthYear('birth_date'))\
.withColumn( 'birth_month', getBirthMonth('birth_date'))\
.withColumn( 'age', getAge('birth_date'))\
.withColumn( 'generation', generationBucketizer('age'))\
.withColumn( 'age_category', ageCategoryBucketizer('age'))\
.withColumn( 'social_state', socialStateBucketizer('income'))\
.withColumn( 'phone_operator', getPhoneOperator('phone_no'))\
.drop('phone_no')

getSellerSize  = udf(lambda z: check_seller_size(z,[5,20,100]))
getUniqueProductCat = udf(lambda z: get_unique_cat(z))

seller_product_df = order_items_df.select(col("seller_id"),col("product_id"))\
.groupBy("seller_id").agg(count('product_id').alias('no_of_products_sold'))

seller_product_cat_df = order_items_df.select(col("seller_id"),col("product_id"))\
.join(products_df.select(col("product_id"),col("product_category_name")).distinct(), how="left", on="product_id")\
.groupBy("seller_id").agg(collect_list("product_category_name"))\
.withColumnRenamed('collect_list(product_category_name)','product_categories_sold')\
.withColumn('product_categories_sold', getUniqueProductCat(col('product_categories_sold')))

seller_df = sk_generator('seller_id','sk_seller','seller')\
.join(seller_product_df, how = "left", on="seller_id")\
.join(seller_product_cat_df, how = "left", on="seller_id")\
.withColumn('seller_size', getSellerSize(col('no_of_products_sold')))

getHasDiscount = udf(lambda z: check_discount(z))
getIsDeliveryDelayed = udf(lambda z: chekc_delayed_delivery(z))

order_discount_df = order_items_df.select(col("order_id"),col("product_id")).distinct()\
.join(products_df.select("product_id","product_discount"), how = "left", on ="product_id")\
.groupBy("order_id").agg({"product_discount":"sum"})

order_df.select("order_id","order_status","delivery_service_id","order_delivered_customer_date","order_estimated_delivery_date")\
.createOrReplaceTempView("orderdetails")

order_details_df = sk_generator('order_id','sk_order_details','orderdetails')\
.join(order_payments_df.select(col("order_id"), col("payment_type")).distinct(), how="left", on = "order_id")\
.join(order_discount_df, how="left", on = "order_id")\
.withColumn("is_returned",lit("NO"))\
.withColumn("has_discount",getHasDiscount("sum(product_discount)"))\
.withColumn("is_delivery_delayed",getIsDeliveryDelayed(array("order_delivered_customer_date","order_estimated_delivery_date")))\
.drop("order_delivered_customer_date","order_estimated_delivery_date","sum(product_discount)")

# order_df --> FACT
# order_purchase_timestamp
# order_approved_at
# order_delivered_carrier_date
# order_delivered_customer_date
# order_estimated_delivery_date

# order_items_df -> FACt
# order_id
# order_item_id
# shipping_limit_date
# price
# freight_value

# order_payments_df -> FACT
# payment_installments
# payment_value
# payment_sequential

getReviewSentiment = udf(lambda z: get_review_sentiment(z))

order_reviews_df = sk_generator('review_id','sk_review','orderreviews')\
.withColumn('review_sentiment', getReviewSentiment(col('review_score')))

getProductVolume = udf(lambda z: get_product_volume(z))
getPackageType = udf(lambda z: get_package_type(z))

products_df = sk_generator('product_id','sk_product','product')\
.withColumn('product_volume', getProductVolume(array('product_length_cm','product_height_cm','product_width_cm')))\
.withColumn('package_type', getPackageType(array('product_volume','product_weight_g')))\
.withColumnRenamed('product_photos_qty','product_photos_quantity')

# unit_price
# product_quantity_on_hand
# product_discount

# to drop
# supplier_id

sdate = datetime.date(2016,1,1)   # start date
edate = datetime.date(2019,12,31)   # end date
pandas.date_range(sdate,edate-datetime.timedelta(days=1),freq='d')

spark.conf.set("spark.sql.broadcastTimeout", "36000")

customer_processed_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/curated/dim_customer.csv")
delivery_services_processed_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/curated/dim_delivery_service.csv")
supplier_processed_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/curated/dim_supplier.csv")
seller_processed_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/curated/dim_seller.csv")
product_processed_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/curated/dim_product.csv")
order_details_processed_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/curated/dim_order_details.csv")
order_review_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/curated/dim_order_review.csv")
